items.title: Here's why Trump says he's commuting prison sentence of ex-GOP Rep. George Santos
items.description: Santos was sentenced to more than seven years in federal prison earlier this year after being convicted of wire fraud and aggravated identity theft.

items.title: What Trump and Zelenskyy are saying after White House meeting on ending Russia's war
items.description: Zelenskyy was in Washington to make his case for America’s Tomahawk cruise missiles and other military assets.

items.title: School staffer dies following alleged assault by 14-year-old student: DA
items.description: The incident occurred at Meadowridge Academy, a therapeutic residential school geared toward students ages 12 to 21 in rural Swansea.
